features: 【 Longer Working Hours, Battery Operated & USB Powered 】Hurricane season good helper. The 2022 Upgrade viniper brand rechargeable small desk fan operates with 3600mA (Built in) and can operate for 8-24 hours after a full charge. At the same time, the bi-directional optimization of the motherboard and battery makes the viniper usb rechargeable fan have longer working hours. It can also be used via USB port from your PC/computer/USB charger or other USB devices.

【3-stage adjustable wind speed & Quietness】 Small but poweful. 3-stage easily adjustable wind speed. The speed of this portable desk battery fan can also be adjusted among low, medium, and high according to your demands. it is decent and quiet which ensure the peaceful flow of air, and enough for personal use.
【Strong Cooling & 180°Rotation】The viniper small desk fan has a strong and stable wind that keeps you cool. not disturbing your rest and work. The USB desk fan has 180 degree adjustable rotation.

【Portable】Used high-quality ABS and Brushless copper motor. It has stable performance and long operating life. And It is trouble-free to put this small ( 6.2*6.2*2.3 inch, weight-9 ounces) and the exquisite battery usb fan into your bag and carry it for outdoor events. Also, it can be used for indoor use. Ideal suitable for office, family, dormitory, library use and etc.

【Package Content & Customer Service】You get 1 x viniper Portable Battery Desk Fan, 1 x USB cable, 1 x user guide, Please write amazon email to us for help if meeting any problem. We will respond within 24-hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THESE FANS !!! Bought 2 so far !!
reviews.reviewText: So I bought my first pink fan around Jul 2022 and a black fan for my husband about Mar 2023 BOTH FANS ARE AMAZING !!! This is an honest review from someone who has had the fan for awhile. Pros: Charge does last EXACTLY as advertised! Ive used my fan overnight (a lot actually) on level 2 and it can hold up with no charge needed, but you can have it plugged in on its charger and still get good air it won’t hurt it from what I noticed and again this is from someone who does this ALOT! This thing is POWERFUL! This thing is small but mighty the air is such a cool relief on a hot day. Easy to travel with and store in my purse to come on the go with me…sometimes I take both. I was able to fly with both of my fans on an airplane! (YES the smaller ones are travel sized) I just want to EMPHASIZE on how much air this thing really blows out! As long as you keep it clean (I clean mine with a few qtips to knock off the dust, hold the blade with one and clean with the other to get the blades I imagine an air duster could probably do the same but that’s not what I was working with) the blades are sturdy, the fan is also pretty sturdy to be small I’ve dropped mine more times than I count and it works just like it did first day!Cons: my pink fan not long after I bought it started making a louder sound while on (still does it to this day, but not annoying loud, just noticeable because it was super quiet before) and I would like try to tap the back which worked for a minute but seems to be no solution for but my black fan still sounds silent. There is not an easier way to clean this fan…we can’t take it apart to simply clean it and snap it back together which is weird because it gives that illusion, the charger that my pink fan came with seems to have a short in it and I have to wiggle the charger a bit if I use the original charger, but the black fan charger one is still fine, but the charger is one of those universal chargers that you would probably have a lot of.Small Cons Lots of pros I only have the small ones for now but these fans are AWESOME! EverytimeSomeone sees me with my fans I never fail to let them know it’s from here! The price is honestly a HUGE DEAL!! Buy you won’t be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Fan that Packs-A-Punch
reviews.reviewText: I work in a clean room where we're required to wear the coverall bunny suits. The suits are made with the intent to keep human particles (ie: skin cells, hair, lint, etc.) from contaminating the environment and equipment. There are times when you can really work up a sweat and the clean room suit only makes the situation worse. It's comparable to wearing a plastic bag around you, retaining all your body heat and odors (gas lol). I always accepted being hot and miserable - folding a piece of clean room paper in half and fanning myself, or putting my face directly into an exhaust fan on a piece of a equipment for relief. I finally came to my senses - duh moment - and started looking for a fan. I needed something that was small and portable as my ergo station doesn't have much real-estate for my tool-kit and other necessary items let alone a large fan to keep me cool. It needed to be portable/cordless as well due to our cyber security protocols. This fan met all the requirements and it has been the best $16 I've spent on an item for work. This little guy packs a punch, it's like being hit by an ice beam. I set the angle of the fan so that the stream of air hits below my chin and neck area and man it works wonders with cooling me off after getting warm.The fan has three speeds, all of which I use throughout my workday. I tend to have it low when I'm setting up for the day to keep me cool and if I start getting warm I'll adjust the fan's speed as necessary. I'm pretty good with turning the fan off when I leave the clean room for break or if I know I'm going to be away from my ergo station for a while, so I've had no issues with the fan dying on me when I need it. Battery-life is a non-issue for me, the battery seems to be powerful enough.I also appreciate the rubber pads on the bottom of the fan to keep it in place, along with ability to oscillate the fan where you need it.The design is simple, yet aesthetic and pleasing.If you want something small, quiet, powerful, and portable, get this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it it’s so easy to move around anywhere on my desk it’s small but powerful. It lasts me on low the whole week (office hours) and it charges up completely in 15mins. It’s nice and quiet and I’ve convinced my coworkers to get themselves one too.

Very nice, small fans. They're what I'd hoped for; small, light, yet stylish with what feels and looks like a quality product. I'd been afraid of receiving something cheap looking and cheap feeling and am very pleased they aren't.Battery life is great. I run these fans from morning to night on the medium speed and the batteries last about 16 hours at that speed.They're nice and quiet too, even on the highest setting. The output is surprisingly good, considering the size!Everything I'd hoped for but didn't really expect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Small, powerful, rechargeable fan... love it!
reviews.reviewText: My mum's had one of these for a couple of years now and loves it. When she told me it keeps her cool at night I decided to get one because I've been keeping my desktop fan on at night which (a) is a bit noisy and (b) uses up electricity. This is neither noisy or uses electricity, apart from obviously when it has to be charged which only takes a 2-4 hours, depending on how much it's been used of course. I doubt that takes up much electricity though. I love this little powerhouse of a fan. It cools me down during the day and night. I get quite hot sometimes at night even in cooler weather and will use this then too. It reminds me a bit of a Dyson fan, although not quite as cooling as they are the gods of fans are a hard act to follow. I'll call this Dyson's cousin :) It's got three speed settings and honestly, the highest speed really cools me down. I then switch down to the second speed then the first. When these come back in stock BUY ONE! There is one that looks virtually identical that is in stock as I type this made by OMASI

Für seine Größe hat der kleine ordentlich Power.Natürlich kann er mit seinen großen Brüdern nicht mithalten, aber das sollte wohl klar sein.Aber so auf dem Tisch oder wenn man draußen sitzt und sich eine kühle Brise wünscht, ist er genau richtig.Und...er ist echt leise.Akku hält so ca. 5-6 Stunden.Kommt natürlich auch auf die Stufe an.Bisher lief er bei mir meistens nur bei Stufe 1-2.Wer ein gutes tragbares windchen an warmen Sommertagen sucht, kommt hier auf seine Kosten.

This is one of the best rechargeable fans I have come across. Does exactly what the specifications state. Takes about 3 hours to charge, and will run for the 8-10 hours. I charged the fan, turned it on and it was still pushing good air 9 hours later.
